animeID:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
animeID:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

animeID:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
animeID:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
animeID:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

animeID:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
animeID:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

animeID:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
animeID:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !animeID:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

animeID:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
animeID:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !animeID:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
